<line: 32> ) 
<line: 33> Defendants.  
<line: 34> ) 

[TITLE]
<line: 36> MOTION FOR LEAVE TO WITHDRAWAL AS COUNSEL  

[TEXT]
<line: 38> COME NOW Attorneys Christian T. Novay, Christopher Dely and John Hunter and 
<line: 39> hereby ask leave of the Court to withdraw as attorneys of record for Defendants, PETER J. 
<line: 40> DiANGI, Individually and as Employee or agent of Silver Lake Country Club, Inc. and as Police 
<line: 41> Officer of Orland Park, a Municipal Corp., and SILVER LAKE COUNTRY CLUB, INC. in the 
<line: 42> above-captioned matter, pursuant to Local Rule 83.17, and in support thereof, state as follows: 

[TEXT]
<line: 44> 1. 
<line: 45> Christian T. Novay, Christopher Dely, and John Hunter (hereinafter “Wilson 
<line: 46> Elser”) entered their appearance on behalf of Defendants, PETER J. DiANGI, Individually and 
<line: 47> as Employee or agent of Silver Lake Country Club, Inc. and as Police Officer of Orland Park, a 
<line: 48> Municipal Corp., and SILVER LAKE COUNTRY CLUB, INC., (hereinafter “Defendants”) on 
<line: 49> April 29, 2008. 

[TEXT]
<line: 51> 2. 
<line: 52> When Wilson Elser entered their appearance, it was believed that the Defendants 
<line: 53> were covered under an insurance policy through, Fireman’s Fund Insurance Company. 

[ABANDON]
<line: 55> 494312.1 

[TITLE]
<line: 2> Case 1:08-cv-02430     Document 9      Filed 06/05/2008     Page 2 of 2

[TEXT]
<line: 4> 3. 
<line: 5> After further review of the policy, it was revealed that there is no coverage 
<line: 6> available to Defendants through Fireman’s Fund Insurance Company and therefore we have no 
<line: 7> duty to defend said Defendants. 

[TEXT]
<line: 9> 4. 
<line: 10> Defendants have been advised that Wilson Elser will move to withdraw as their 
<line: 11> attorneys because of the aforementioned. 

[TEXT]
<line: 13> WHEREFORE, the movants Christian T. Novay, Christopher Dely, and John Hunter of 
<line: 14> Wilson, Elser, Moskowitz, Edelman & Dicker LLP, respectfully pray that this Court grant them 
<line: 15> leave to withdraw as attorneys for, PETER J. DiANGI, Individually and as Employee or agent of 
<line: 16> Silver Lake Country Club, Inc. and as Police Officer of Orland Park, a Municipal Corp., and 
<line: 17> SILVER LAKE COUNTRY CLUB, INC. in this cause. 

[TEXT]
<line: 19> Respectfully Submitted, 

[TITLE]
<line: 21> WILSON, 
<line: 22> ELSER, 
<line: 23> MOSKOWITZ, 
<line: 24> EDELMAN & DICKER LLP 

[TEXT]
<line: 26> By: /s/ Christian T. Novay 
<line: 27>       One of Their Attorneys 

[TEXT]
